description: This operation purchases a provisioned capacity unit for an AWS account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The AWS account ID of the account that owns the vault. You can either specify an AWS account ID or optionally a single ---' (hyphen), in which case Amazon S3 Glacier uses the AWS account ID associated with the credentials used to sign the request. If you use an account ID, don't include any hyphens (---') in the ID. Note: this parameter is set to '-' bydefault if no value is not specified.

nested_items.name: capacityId
nested_items.description: The ID that identifies the provisioned capacity unit.
